alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer and northwestern St. Clair Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 409 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lum, or near Lapeer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dryden around 415 PM EDT. Imlay City around 420 PM EDT. Capac around 435 PM EDT. Yale and Emmett around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Riley Center, Allenton, Goodland Township, Attica, Berville, Lynn Township, Brockway and Thornville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
